item.description:
Don’t miss out on your chance to taste some of the area’s best gourmet cuisine on wheels at the Boston Food Truck Festival.

The festival will take place from 11am until 4pm.

Come early, come hungry!

Check out this link to purchase tickets online.

  • Festival will feature a variety of cuisines from at least 20 different food trucks.
  • Online ticket costs: 1) $14.71 for 10  2) $27.37 for 20
  • Tickets can be purchased on site in quantities of ten (10)
  • Individual trucks will determine their menu and number of tickets required per item. 
  • No outside food and/or beverages are allowed at the festival.
  • FESTIVAL IS RAIN OR SHINE.
  • All sales are final unless otherwise authorized.

EAT EAT EAT DRINK DRINK DRINK BE MERRY MERRY MERRY

Share your experience by taking the event survey or posting a message after.

Check out this link for driving and public transportatiion directions as well as parking information.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing an orange plastic peace sign bead necklace. Call/text 617 445-7549 if you need help finding the group.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Food Truck Festival Extravaganza Part Trois
